The Mighty Mack supports up to a 600lb. weight capacity, but still fits through doorways and into cars to give the user indoor and outdoor independence. The Might Mack has the signature extra wide (20") oversized padded seat. Heavy-duty bearings and 8" solid wheels provide added security and support.
